title: The Little Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Cambodian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant with open terrace that offers Khmer and Western food. Has an extensive menu with 2 full pages of vegetarian meals, including Khmer specialties, starters/salads, soups and stir-frys, some of which are vegan or can be made vegan, including desserts. Fruit shakes (with or without milk) are also available. Menu clearly states that no fish sauce, oyster sauce or shrimp paste are used. Some meals (Khmer curries) possibly vegan. Staff speaks very good English. Free fast Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: Samdech Tep Vong St, Krong Siem Reap, Kambodscha
